scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Pentecost, with the Virgin Mary seated on the right, reading from a book, and the Apostles gathered around, looking upwards with hands clasped in prayer. A dove, representing the Holy Spirit, descends from a radiant sky, illuminating a distant landscape with buildings. The figures are positioned within an architectural setting characterized by ornate columns and arches, suggesting an interior space that opens to the sky and a view of the outside world.
